title: Avoidme
author: Avoidme
created_time: November 19, 2023, 06:10:45 AMLast edit: November 29, 2023, 03:15:25 PM by Avoidme
content: QuoteJOJO Bounty Succcessfully Ended. Thank you for participating iin our campaign.  I will finalize the sheet as soon as possible.        *Website* Telegram*Twitter*Channel* Whitepaper*  1. Every participant should follow Twitter, Telegram, and Telegram channel  2. Total $2K worth of $JOJO tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants. Reward will be distributed to participants ETH address.3. The bounty program was launched on November 20th, 2023 and will run until November 28th, 2023. 4. Team will distribute the reward on TGE day to participants ETH address (No specific date).5. Bounty manager has the right to change any rules if required.6. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC if needed. TERMS AND CONDITIONS1. Telegram and Twitter Requirements:   - All participants must join the JOJO's Telegram, Telegram channel , and Twitter   - All participants must join the BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.2. Telegram disqualification:   - Discussing the bounty program in the project chat group will result in immediate disqualification from the     campaign and a permanent ban from the company chat group. Please direct your bounty-related questions to     the BTT Bounty Managers's Telegram Group3. Misconduct and Violations:   - Any participant found engaging in unethical or fraudulent practices during any campaign will be disqualified.   - Participants using offensive language or participating in any form of financial misconduct will be disqualified.4. Adherence to Rules:   - Participants are required to follow the rules outlined in these campaigns. Failure to do so will result in rewards      not being granted as per the campaign's terms, and no negotiations will be entertained.5. Disqualification Consequences:   - Disqualified members will forfeit all the coins they have earned, and this action is irreversible.   - Disqualified members will not be individually notified about their disqualification. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.6. Weekly Reporting:   - All participants must submit their weekly reports for social campaigns on this bounty thread. Stakes will be   calculated on a weekly basis, and you are required to create new reports each week. Edited reports and proof of   authentication will not be counted. Here is report format Code:Week:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …Tweets URL1...2... 7. Authentication Proof:   - It is mandatory for all participants to submit proof of authentication in the campaign thread they are     participating in. Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: Forum Profile Link: Telegram Username: Participated Campaigns:  ETH Wallet Address:8. Stake Updates:   - Stakes will be updated on a weekly basis.Please ensure that you read and understand these terms and conditions thoroughly before participating in the bounty program. Violating these terms may lead to disqualification and the loss of earned rewards. Twitter              50% Video               50% Week 1 (20.11 -28.11)Rewards:Participants will be rewarded (1-6 stakes ) based on their Tweet and Retweet quality andengagement with this tweet ( Like and Comment)Rules:1. All participants must follow JOJO’s official  Twitter, Telegram, and Telegram channel 2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 400 followers.3. Participants are required to create 2 new tweets and retweet 4 tweets each week.4. There should be a minimum 24-hour gap between each retweet or tweet.5. In each retweet incorporate following hashtags: #JOJOMEMECOIN #MEME #ETH 6.  In each tweet mention @jojomemecoin, should have coincise but valuable comment and incorporate following hashtags: #JOJOMEMECOIN #MEME #ETH How to join:1. Join JOJO's Twitter, Telegram, and Telegram channel 2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link: [TWITTER FORM] Rewards:- Legendary quality: 5 stakes- Excellent quality: 4 stakes- High quality: 3 stakes- Good quality: 2 stakes- Average quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Each participant is permitted to submit a maximum of 2 original videos (20-23 Nov 1 video and 24-28 Nov 1 video)2. Participants must have a minimum of 100+ YouTube subscribers. Videos should be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.3. Video content must be focused on relevant topics such as project features, the latest updates on the project's token, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face-cam videos are highly recommended and will be given additional consideration, although videos without a face-cam are also accepted. Face-cam and high-quality animation videos will earn extra stakes.6. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and the overall quality of the video.7. Videos should not be removed or deleted. Removal or deletion will lead to disqualification.8. All videos must include links to the Proof of Authentication, the project's website,  Twitter page, Telegram group, Telegram channel, or any other relevant social media.9. At the end of the video, provide sufficient details about the producer (bounty hunter) to ensure authenticity. This information will be verified.How to join:1. Join JOJO's official Twitter, Telegram, and Telegram channel 2. Join BTT Bounty Manager's TelegramGroup,Telegram Channel, and Twitter.3. Complete the registration form by clicking on this link:[Video Form]   Disclaimer: This bounty campaign operates without an official escrow service. I cannot provide a guarantee regarding the distribution of rewards upon the campaign's conclusion. However, I have confidence in the team's strength and communication capabilities. Therefore, I hope that rewards will be distributed as planned and in a timely manner. Participation in this bounty campaign, investment in their ICO/IDO/IEO, or utilization of their platform is at your own discretion and risk. I cannot be held responsible in the event that the developers or project team fail to meet their stated goals or obligations to bounty participants, investors, or any other stakeholders.
